content: slip_stitch to join in the round <10 sts> round 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 2 in each st to the end slip_stitch to join <20 sts> round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 in same st half_double_crochet repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <30 sts> gourdgeousknits com - instagram @gourdgeousknits - facebook com/gourdgeousknits 2 round 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 in same st half_double_crochet 2 repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <40 sts> round 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 2 in same st half_double_crochet 3 repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <50 sts> round 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 2 in same st half_double_crochet 4 repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <60 sts> round 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 5 half_double_crochet 2 in same st half_double_crochet 5 repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <70 sts> rounds 8-10 chain 2 half_double_crochet around slip_stitch to join <70 sts> round 11 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 3 hdc2tog half_double_crochet 5 hdc2tog repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <60 sts> round 12 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet 2 hdc2tog half_double_crochet 4 hdc2tog repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <50 sts> round 13 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st half_double_crochet hdc2tog half_double_crochet 3 hdc2tog repeat to the end slip_stitch to join <40 sts> round 14 chain 2 half_double_crochet in chain st hdc2tog half_double_crochet 2 hdc2tog repeat to the end <30 sts> round 15 chain 2 hdc2tog half_double_crochet hdc2tog repeat to the end <20 sts> pause here and begin to stuff the pumpkin once you re satisfied with the squishiness of your pumpkin continue crocheting with round 16 round 16 chain 2 half_double_crochet hdc2tog repeat to the end <10 sts> finish off by slipping stiches around the round to close the hole assembly 1 cut a very long tail approximately 20-25 long 2 use a tapestry needle to pull the long tail the middle of the work and turn it so that the beginning rounds are at the top 3 use the crochet hook to slip_stitch the long tail through any of the sts in round 1 to pull up a loop 4 chain 12 and slip_stitch to the opposite side of round 1 to connect the chain this will make a small stem loop 5 pull the long tail through to fasten the chain 6 push the tapestry needle and long tail through the middle of the work so that the yarn wraps around the outside of the work 7 hide the tail along the outside of the work in between the half-double_crochet stitches 8 continue through the middle hiding the long tail 4 times total 9 tie a knot on the end of the long tail to secure and cut any excess yarn 10 enjoy your gourdgeous mini gourdgeousknits com - instagram @gourdgeousknits - facebook com/gourdgeousknits 3
